import Head from 'next/head' import { Card, Row,Input,Layout } from 'antd'; import React from 'react'; import { Tabs } from 'antd'; const { TabPane } = Tabs; import Link from 'next/link' import NavbarMain from './NavbarMain'; export default function Home() { const [array,setArray] = React.useState(names) const [tooltype,setTooltype] = React.useState(toolType) const handleChangeTrue = () => { let newTooltype = tooltype newTooltype.map(item=>item.show =true) setTooltype(newTooltype) } const [tools,setTools] = React.useState(names) const handleSearch = (key) => { console.log("key",key) handleChangeTrue() setArray(tools.filter((item) => ((key!== "") && item.display.toLowerCase().indexOf(key.toLowerCase())!== -1) )) if(key ==="") setArray(tools) console.log(array) } const handleShow = (id) => { let newTooltype = tooltype newTooltype.map(item=>item.id===id &&( item.show=!item.show)) setTooltype(newTooltype) console.log(tooltype) setBool(!bool) } const [bool,setBool] = React.useState(true) return (

search} onInput={(e)=>handleSearch(e.target.value)} /> {array.map(item=> item.type === type.type && <> {item.type === 'instrumentation' && {item.display} } {item.type === 'electrical' && {item.display} } {item.type === 'conversions' && {item.display} } {item.type === 'mechanical' && {item.display} } )}
) } {/* MOBILE VIEW */} search} onInput={(e)=>handleSearch(e.target.value)} /> {tooltype!==undefined && tooltype.map( (type) =>
